item.title: Creating my first DApp
item.description: It’s time to get my Q3 goals going and I’ve decided to go with the DApp! I will do this in 4 steps: Create a lottery contract using the remix platform; Create a frontend to interact with the contract, that should be connected to metamask; Deploy the contract to a testnet like Rinkeby; Maybe deploy the app to heroku. So, the contract should be able to: Allow players to enter the lottery with a fixed amount of ether, like 0.
